project

Class Canvas

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • project.Canvas

  • public class Canvas
extends java.util.Observable
    Represents the drawing canvas of the project. It is the project's main model. Includes all Layers and their respective GraphicElements. Canvas extends Observable and can be observed when needed.
    See Also:
    Layer

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Canvas()
      Creates a new Canvas of default size with no Layers.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Canvas

        public Canvas()
        Creates a new Canvas of default size with no Layers. Default ModifyStrategy is ModifyOverwrite.

      • addLayer

        public void addLayer(java.lang.String shapeType)
        Adds a new Layer. The shape type needs to be provided as a parameter.
        Parameters:
        shapeType - The type of GraphicElement that the Layer should hold

      • removeLayer

        public void removeLayer(int layerIndex)
        Removes the Layer with the specified index.
        Parameters:

      • modifyLayer

        public void modifyLayer(int layerIndex,
                        java.lang.String attributes)
        Modifies the Layer with the specified index using the specified attributes.
        Parameters:
        layerIndex - The index of the Layer to modify
        attributes - A JSON String containing the attributes to be modified

      • getJSON

        public java.lang.String getJSON()
        Returns a JSON representation of the Canvas. Modifications to the Canvas should use the same attribute names.
        Returns:
        A String containing a JSON representation of the Canvas
        See Also:
        Layer.getJSON()
